fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose a house to have a Shootout at.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You start with 2 Debt Records.
- You gain Powerful attack and defense during a Shootout.
- During a Shootout, all players visiting the target will attempt to attack you (which does not take up their night action). They will use their default attack value.
- You will shoot everyone visiting the Shootout except for the target.
- When you kill two people of different factions in a Shootout, you erase 1 Debt Record.
- You can't start a Shootout two nights in a row.
